title: OOH Organisation Object
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

$schema.description: $schema only included to aid validation of JSON, should not be used in real calls.

AddressLine1.description: The first line of the address

AddressLine2.description: The optional second line of the address

City.description: The name of the city in which the address is located

Country.description: The name of the country in which the address is located

PostalCode.description: The postal or zip code for the address

State.description: The name of the state/province/country in which the address is located

AdvertiserBrands.description: Defines the details of a Brands associated with an organisation

AdvertiserBrand.description: Define the details of a Brand associated with an organization

Contacts.description: A list of one or more contacts with the organisation

Contact.description: Defines details for an individual contact with an Organization

Honorific.description: The contact's honorific such as Mr, Mrs

Type.description: The type of contact that this resource represents (e.g. billing, creative)

AddressLine1.description: The first line of the address

AddressLine2.description: The optional second line of the address

City.description: The name of the city in which the address is located

Country.description: The name of the country in which the address is located

PostalCode.description: The postal or zip code for the address

State.description: The name of the state/province/country in which the address is located

Disapproval Reason.description: The reason why the organisation was not registered. Must be specified if Status is Disapproved

Id.description: A system-generated opaque ID that uniquely identifies this resource

Industry.description: An industry label for the organisation. Only required for advertiser organisation

OrganizationType.description: The core activity that an organisation undertakes as a business e.g. advertiser, OOH Specialist or Media Agency

OOHProviderData.description: Detail structured information that may be used to identify their order in a Seller's system using their own IDs or reference

CampaignId.description: Provided by the Buyer to uniquely identify  the Advertising Campaign for which the Order is being placed

CampaignName.description: A descriptive name provided by the Buyer which is associated with the Advertising Campaign for which the Order is being placed

PoNumber.description: A reference to be used by buyers doe any offline contact related to the Order

SalesOrderReference.description: The OrganizationID of a Barter Company can be added here to flag a Barter transaction

Other.description: An opaque CLOB of provider-defined data

Status.description: A value that indicates the current state of the approval process. The approval process confirms the organizatoin's identity

Url.description: A URL to the organization's website
